author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IMELDA STRENGTHENING... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS CONTINUE FOR THE NORTHWEST BAHAMAS AND INTERESTS IN BERMUDA SHOULD CLOSELY MONITOR IMELDA...
summary: ...IMELDA STRENGTHENING... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS CONTINUE FOR THE NORTHWEST BAHAMAS AND INTERESTS IN BERMUDA SHOULD CLOSELY MONITOR IMELDA... As of 11:00 AM EDT Mon Sep 29 the center of Imelda was located near 26.9, -77.1 with movement N at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 988 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IMELDA STRENGTHENING... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS CONTINUE FOR THE NORTHWEST BAHAMAS AND INTERESTS IN BERMUDA SHOULD CLOSELY MONITOR IMELDA... As of 11:00 AM EDT Mon Sep 29 the center of Imelda was located near 26.9, -77.1 with movement N at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 988 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Imelda (AT4/AL092025)
